network

Class StrategoPieceUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.StrategoMessage
      • network.StrategoPieceUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StrategoPieceBattle

    public class StrategoPieceUpdate
extends StrategoMessage
    A message that a piece has been placed, removed, or moved.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • StrategoPieceUpdate

                           Loc to,
                           boolean team)
        Create a message that a piece has moved.
        Parameters:
        from - Old location
        to - New location
        team - False for red, true for blue.

      • StrategoPieceUpdate

        public StrategoPieceUpdate(Loc to,
                           PieceType pieceType,
                           boolean team)
        Create a message that a piece has been placed.
        Parameters:
        to - Placed location.
        pieceType - Piece type that was placed.
        team - Which team the piece belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • isPlacement

        public boolean isPlacement()
        Get whether this message represents a piece placement.
        Returns:
        True if this message is a placement, false otherwise.

      • isMove

        public boolean isMove()
        Get whether this message represents a move.
        Returns:

        public boolean isRemove()
        Get whether this message represents a remove.
        Returns:

      • getPieceType

        public PieceType getPieceType()
        Get the type of piece that was placed. This is only applicable when this message is for piece placement.
        Returns:
        New piece type.
